info.title: Ello.AI API
info.description: API for managing agents and calls in Ello.AI

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific agent by its ID

greeting.example: Hello! How can I assist you today?

prompt.example: You are a helpful AI assistant focused on providing accurate and friendly responses.

put.description: Updates an existing agent by ID.

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent to update.

example.name: My Inbound Agent
example.greeting: Hello! How can I assist you today?
example.prompt: You are a helpful AI Agent focused on providing accurate and friendly responses.

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent to delete

greeting.example: Hello! How can I assist you today?

prompt.example: You are a helpful AI assistant focused on providing accurate and friendly responses.

post.description: Creates a new agent of specified type.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of agents

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Filter agents created on or after this date (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Filter agents created before this date (ISO 8601)

requestBody.description: Advanced filter groups (AND between groups, OR within group)

post.description: Assigns an existing knowledge base to one or more agents.

parameters.name: kb_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the knowledge base to assign.

post.description: Removes an existing knowledge base association from one or more agents.

parameters.name: kb_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the knowledge base to unassign.

post.description: Creates a single-source knowledge base using a URL, base URL, and sub-links.

200.description: Single source knowledge base created successfully

message.example: Single source knowledge base created successfully

description.example: Single source knowledge base: srikanth test

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of knowledge bases for a workspace

data.name: Test
data.description: Updated description of the knowledge base 1

get.description: Retrieves a knowledge base by workspace and kb ID with pagination

parameters.name: kb_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the knowledge base

delete.description: Deletes a knowledge base by workspace and kb ID

parameters.name: kb_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the knowledge base

put.description: Updates an existing knowledge base by ID.

parameters.name: kb_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the knowledge base to update.

post.description: Creates and initiates a new call for the specified agent.

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent initiating the call.

message.example: Hello! Am I speaking to Sri?

get.description: Fetches call statistics for agents with pagination, filtering by date range, status, and agent type.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter calls by status (e.g. success, failed).

parameters.name: agent_type
parameters.description: Filter calls by agent type (e.g. webcall, phonecall).

get.description: Fetches a paginated list of phone numbers associated with the authenticated user.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of phone numbers to return per page.

put.summary: Assign or Update Phone Number for Agent
put.description: Assigns or updates a phone number for a specific agent by their ID.

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent to assign or update the phone number for.

phone_number.description: The phone number to be assigned or updated for the agent.

200.description: Phone number assigned or updated successfully

post.description: Creates a new campaign with an uploaded recipients file, linked assistant, and schedule settings.

assistantId.description: The ID of the assistant (agent) associated with this campaign.

scheduleTime.description: Scheduled time for the campaign in ISO format.

scheduleEnabled.description: Set to 'true' to enable scheduling for the campaign.

file.description: CSV file containing the list of recipients for the campaign.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of created campaigns with optional filters such as search and status.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search keyword to filter campaigns by name or other attributes.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter campaigns based on their current status.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of campaigns to return per page.

get.description: Retrieves detailed statistics and metadata for a specific conversation of a given agent, including duration, status, outcome, and compliance summary.

summary.example: In the conversation, the customer, Sri, was greeted by the agent Ryan, who introduced himself as a Credit Card Customer Support Agent at BRFC Bank. The purpose of the call was to remind Sri about an upcoming credit card bill due date. Ryan asked how Sri was doing but did not gather any specific bill details during the interaction.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all conversations for a specific agent, filtered by date range if provided.
Returns all calls the user has access to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return
